meanings.sent1: I will dele the extra words from the document.
meanings.sent2: Remember to dele any unnecessary files from the folder.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked us to dele the incorrect answers, but I accidentally dele the whole page!
meanings.sent4: Her decision to dele him from her life was difficult but necessary.
meanings.sent5: With a swift dele, he erased the mistake and started over.

meanings.definition: A mark used to indicate that something should be deleted or ignored
meanings.sent1: Please put a dele next to the incorrect information.
meanings.sent2: The dele on the paper showed where the error was.
meanings.sent3: I drew a smiley face next to the dele to make it less serious.
meanings.sent4: The dele on the map pointed out the location of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The red dele stood out on the white background, signaling the mistake.
